name: Narrow Dark Cave
description:
Narrow Dark Cave is an action-adventure game with two genres of Platformer games and a few Metroidvania.

2D Pixel game graphics with dark tones create a feeling of nostalgia and mystery.

The game takes place inside a narrow, science fiction 2D Pixel-style cave.

You will play as a death row inmate trying to escape the dungeon. During the escape you will get bored with mutated creatures. You must destroy them and gain experience to upgrade your skills to become more powerful. When your character is strong enough to destroy the boss, a happy ending will come to your character.

Hope you enjoy this 2d pixel game. If anything goes wrong please leave a comment I will fix it in the updates.
